video.title: A day at Pennybox with Co-Founder Reji Eapen
video.description:
A day at Pennybox with Co-Founder Reji Eapen.

www.pennybox.com

-
Learn to code for free and get a developer job: https://www.freecodecamp.com

Read hundreds of articles on programming: https://medium.freecodecamp.com

topLevelComment.author: Bogdan Nedelcu
topLevelComment.text: You look similar to Dinesh in Silicon Valley show. :) Keep up de good work.

topLevelComment.author: zeroxcub
topLevelComment.text: At last, I don't mind the shaking a least this guy is actualy showing what he use and explain his workflow, not just wandering and saying what he does like other video.

topLevelComment.author: George Motuliki
topLevelComment.text: the guy in the background must be a FOODIE cause he turned when he heard the key word "YUM"!

topLevelComment.author: Samantha Burress
topLevelComment.text: Wish there were more videos/content like this.  Thanks for the look into what you're doing!

topLevelComment.author: Mrinmay
topLevelComment.text: @freeCodeCamp absolutely digging this series. Do keep em coming. <3
the most important thing is coffee. i second that.

topLevelComment.author: Marlon
topLevelComment.text: Loving the new videos. Your 'Day at' and 'Ask Preethi' videos are great.

topLevelComment.author: JOOLEAN
topLevelComment.text: Amazing video and walk-through, love the transparency and how the founder explains the creation-process and his "day-in-the-life"-tasks. 👏 🚀  Interesting concept and proposed parent-child interaction. The only thing that could be improved is the splash screen and it's logo (should be more centered, closer to title and smaller imo), the visually dominant background-gradient with its vibrant orange - and code-documentation. ✌️

topLevelComment.author: Adam Naor
topLevelComment.text: Its a pleasure getting to work with Reji to build Pennybox.com. This video shows his tenacity, grit, and organization - all things that make him a thoughtful entrepreneur!

replies.author: Vicki Kirk
replies.text: Adam Naor  Then tell him Pennybox stopped working with no notice. My down and I relied on that app to manage all his allowances and chores in and out. Now we’re sol!
